nodes.text: As of 138 ABY, Governor Biala resided at the governor's palace in Carreras Major's capital city. It had at least three large rounded pyramid-like structures. That same year, the Sith impostor Darth Wredd, who was impersonating the Imperial Knight Yalta Val, visited the palace to report the death of four members of Carreras Major security force to Governor Biala. The palace was also known to have a hangar bay. Later, Darth Wredd began mobilizing Biala's security forces at the hangar bay to deal with the alleged "Sith threat"—the junk dealer Ania Solo and her companions.
